Package de.hsmw.threemaextractor.service.data

Class Avatar

java.lang.Object
de.hsmw.threemaextractor.service.data.Avatar
public class Avatar extends Object
represents contact and group avatars

  • Constructor Details

    • Avatar

      public Avatar​(File avatarFile, MasterKey masterKey) throws IOException
      initialize and decrypt the avatar
      Parameters:
      avatarFile - encrypted avatar file (see getContactAvatarFile(File, String, boolean), getGroupAvatarFile(File, int) )
      masterKey - master key
      Throws:
      IOException - if an invalid file is specified

  • Method Details

    • getAvatar

      public RenderedImage getAvatar()
      Returns:
      the avatar as RenderedImage

    • writeToFile

      public void writeToFile​(File outputDir, String fileName) throws IOException
      writes the avatar to a specific jpg file
      Parameters:
      outputDir - the output dir
      fileName - the file name (excluding .jpg)
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file couldn't be created

    • getContactAvatarFile

      public static File getContactAvatarFile​(File mediaDir, String identity, boolean isUser) throws FileNotFoundException
      returns the associated encrypted file of a contact avatar
      Parameters:
      mediaDir - media dir (see FileStore.getMediaDir())
      identity - Threema ID of the desired contact
      isUser - whether the desired contact is the user themself
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file is not present (contact has no avatar set or file was deleted)

    • getGroupAvatarFile

      public static File getGroupAvatarFile​(File mediaDir, int groupId) throws FileNotFoundException
      returns the associated encrypted file of a group avatar
      Parameters:
      mediaDir - media dir (see FileStore.getMediaDir())
      groupId - the ID of the desired group
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file is not present (group has no avatar set or file was deleted)
